title: Camera Configuration
description: Configuration for a single camera (matches CameraConfigurationJson.java)

name.description: Unique name of the camera used as subsystem identifier

strategy.description: Pose estimation strategy for PhotonVision cameras

column.description: SmartDashboard column index for telemetry display

x.description: Camera X position offset from robot center in meters (forward/backward)

y.description: Camera Y position offset from robot center in meters (left/right)

z.description: Camera Z position offset from robot center in meters (up/down)

roll.description: Camera roll rotation in degrees around X-axis

pitch.description: Camera pitch rotation in degrees around Y-axis

yaw.description: Camera yaw rotation in degrees around Z-axis

width.description: Horizontal resolution of the camera in pixels

height.description: Vertical resolution of the camera in pixels
